export const ShowTask = () => { const tasks = [ {id: 10001, name:"TASK A", time: "2:09:01 AM 9/14/2023"}, {id: 10002, name:"TASK B", time: "2:09:01 AM 9/14/2023"}, {id: 10003, name:"TASK C", time: "2:09:01 AM 9/14/2023"}] return (
To-do 0
    { tasks.map((task)=>(

  • {task.name} {task.time}

    • )) }
) }
